## Erc1155.totalSupply() method

Returns the total supply of a specific token

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tokenId | BigNumberish | The token ID to get the total supply of |
